thread.title: Conan Look At My Life, A Cover of Neil Young’s Song ‘Old Man’ With Lyrics About ‘Conan the Barbarian’
thread.title_full: Conan Look At My Life, A Cover of Neil Young’s Song ‘Old Man’ With Lyrics About ‘Conan the Barbarian’

author: Justin Page
title: Conan Look At My Life, A Cover of Neil Young’s Song ‘Old Man’ With Lyrics About ‘Conan the Barbarian’

organizations.name: laughing squid tips  related laughing squid posts boy george & jack black channel jim morrison

text:
Boulder, Colorado video editor and writer Nat Kramer has created “ Conan Look At My Life ,” a clever video featuring a cover of Neil Young ‘s hit song “ Old Man ” with footage and lyrics about the 1982 film Conan the Barbarian . Here is the original song for comparison.

submitted via Laughing Squid Tips
